docs.lead_paragraph: If the rules are made final, they would shift the responsibility for ensuring that food is safe from the F.D.A. to companies like Walmart and Cargill.

headline.main: F.D.A. Says Importers Must Audit Food Safety
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Says Importers Must Audit Food Safety

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration proposes rules that for first time put main onus on companies to ensure that food they import is safe; if made final, rules would subject imported foods to the same safety standards as food produced domestically and require companies importing the food to make sure it meets those standards.
docs.snippet: If the rules are made final, they would shift the responsibility for ensuring that food is safe from the F.D.A. to companies like Walmart and Cargill.

docs.lead_paragraph: Remarks by the New Jersey governor provided a vivid reminder of why he has so become a national figure and leading 2016 contender for the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.main: Christie Assails Libertarian Shift on National Security by Some in the G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Christie Assails Libertarian Shift on National Security by Some in the G.O.P.

docs.abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, addressing Republican donors, assails members of GOP who question whether government surveillance efforts have trampled on civil liberties; Christie's remarks, along with his characteristic pugnacity and wit, are vivid reminder of why he has become a national figure and leading 2016 contender for Republican presidential nomination.
docs.snippet: Remarks by the New Jersey governor provided a vivid reminder of why he has so become a national figure and leading 2016 contender for the Republican presidential nomination.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun’s suspension only added to the worry over the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez, who also has been accused of using performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.main: Yanks Voice Support for Rodriguez, and for Efforts to Rid Game of Doping
headline.print_headline: Yanks Voice Support for Rodriguez, and for Efforts to Rid Game of Doping

docs.abstract: Milwaukee Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun’s suspension only adds to worry over New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez, who also has been accused of using performance-enhancing drugs; those closest to Rodriguez say they would support him like a brother, regardless of what may occur in coming weeks.
docs.snippet: Ryan Braun’s suspension only added to the worry over the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez, who also has been accused of using performance-enhancing drugs.
